title: Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens

features.description:
Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens: Redefining Speed, Quality and Kitchen Efficiency

The Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens represent the next generation of accelerated cooking technology for professional kitchens. Designed for operators who demand rapid service without compromising food quality, these high-performance ovens combine cutting-edge innovation with intuitive control. From busy cafés and bistros to quick service restaurants, service stations, sports clubs, schools, universities and hotel room service operations, the Lainox Oracle Boosted delivers consistent, high-margin results at speed.

Key Features and Benefits – Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens

• Triple cooking technology: microwave, fan-assisted convection and impingement
• Dual cooking modes: High Speed and Combi Wave
• 3 phase model for enhanced power and faster throughput
• Oracle Odorless System – no extraction required
• 7” configurable touch screen display
• WiFi connectivity with Nabook Plus integration
• Countertop design for flexible installation
• Rapid cooling system with removable Oracle Wash Box
• Ideal for a wide variety of fresh, chilled and frozen food items

Advanced Cooking Technology in Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens

Triple Cooking Technology

The Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens incorporate three integrated cooking technologies: microwave energy for rapid internal heating, fan-assisted convection for even air circulation, and impingement for high-velocity hot air distribution. This intelligent combination ensures exceptional speed without drying food, crisp finishes with evenly heated interiors, significantly reduced cooking times compared to conventional ovens and consistent results across multiple menu items. The synergy of these technologies allows operators to increase output, reduce ticket times and maintain premium food quality during peak service.

Dual Cooking Modes – High Speed & Combi Wave

The oven features two distinct operating modes to maximise flexibility. High Speed Mode utilises microwave, convection and impingement simultaneously for ultra-fast cooking. Combi Wave Mode allows the operator to select convection, microwave or a combination of both. This versatility enables you to toast, bake, regenerate and finish with precision, adapt cooking methods to different product types and deliver bespoke cooking programmes tailored to your menu. Whether preparing toasted sandwiches, pastries, pizzas or plated meals, the Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens provide complete operational control.

3 Phase Power Supply

The 3 phase configuration provides increased power delivery and enhanced speed performance, making the oven ideal for high-demand commercial environments. Faster heat recovery times, increased productivity during peak periods, reliable heavy-duty performance and reduced service bottlenecks all contribute to improved workflow efficiency. For busy operators, this translates directly into higher throughput, improved service speed and stronger profit margins.

Oracle Odorless System – No Extraction Required

A standout feature of the Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens is the integrated Oracle Odorless System, engineered to reduce steam and cooking odours at source. This advanced filtration technology minimises vapour emissions and effectively removes odours, negating the need for traditional extraction systems. The result is flexible installation, as the unit fits on a standard commercial kitchen counter and can be positioned virtually anywhere. This reduces capital expenditure, simplifies compliance requirements and opens up new front-of-house cooking opportunities.

7” Configurable Touch Screen Display

The intuitive 7-inch touch screen interface allows complete menu customisation to suit your operational requirements. Operators can display only relevant recipes, amend cooking times and settings, upload custom food images for instant recognition and add new menu items with ease. This user-focused control system reduces staff training time, enhances consistency and streamlines kitchen workflow, even during peak trading periods.

WiFi Connectivity and Nabook Plus Platform

WiFi connectivity comes as standard, enabling recipes to be uploaded, shared and managed via the Nabook Plus platform. This cloud-based solution provides access to cooking programmes and professional advice from operators around the world. Multi-site businesses can standardise recipes across locations, update menus remotely and continuously optimise performance. The Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens are therefore not only powerful but future-ready.

Rapid Cooling System and Oracle Wash Box

Cleaning efficiency is essential in commercial catering environments. The rapid cooling system allows the oven to cool quickly after service, reducing downtime and enabling faster turnaround for maintenance. The removable Oracle Wash Box protects the oven chamber and can be easily detached for thorough cleaning. Specialist cleaning chemicals are also available to prevent grease build-up or remove existing residue, ensuring long-term performance, hygiene compliance and reduced servicing costs.

Why Choose Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens?

In today’s competitive foodservice sector, speed alone is not enough. Customers expect quality, consistency and presentation. The Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens deliver all three. They enable operators to expand hot food offerings without major kitchen refits, increase average transaction values, reduce labour dependency and improve overall energy efficiency. This is more than just a high speed oven; it is a strategic investment in operational efficiency, menu expansion and revenue growth.

Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens – The Smart Choice for Modern Foodservice

If your business demands rapid service, exceptional food quality and flexible installation, the Lainox Oracle Boosted High Speed Ovens are the definitive solution. Engineered for performance, designed for profitability and built to meet the evolving demands of professional catering environments, they provide accelerated cooking without compromise.

title: Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens

features.description:
Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens: Compact Power, Maximum Performance

The Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens are engineered for professional kitchens where space is limited but performance cannot be compromised. Combining advanced accelerated cooking technology with a compact footprint, the Oracle XS delivers rapid service, consistent results and exceptional food quality. Ideal for cafés, convenience outlets, quick service restaurants, hotel bars, forecourts and workplace catering environments, this high speed oven enables operators to expand hot food menus without costly extraction systems or major refits.

Designed for efficiency-driven businesses, the Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens provide the speed of a microwave with the finish of a convection oven, helping you increase throughput, reduce waiting times and maximise revenue per square metre.

Key Features and Benefits – Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens

  • Compact countertop design ideal for space-conscious kitchens

  • High speed cooking performance for rapid service

  • Professional-grade build quality

  • Efficient internal cooking chamber dimensions for versatile menu options

  • Robust construction suited to demanding commercial environments

  • Ideal for fresh, chilled and frozen food preparation

Advanced Design and Engineering – Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens

Dimensions – Unit

Measuring 356mm in width, 588mm in depth and 580mm in height, the Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens are specifically designed to fit comfortably on a standard commercial countertop. With a maximum outer width of 356mm, maximum exterior depth of 636mm and maximum exterior height of 580mm, this unit integrates seamlessly into compact kitchen layouts.

The slimline footprint allows operators to optimise workspace efficiency without sacrificing output capacity. Perfect for front-of-house positioning or back-bar installation, the Oracle XS supports revenue generation in areas previously unsuitable for hot food production.

Net Weight

With a net weight of 40kg, the Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens provide a solid and stable platform during operation. The balanced construction reduces vibration and ensures durability in high-frequency service environments.

The substantial build quality reflects its commercial-grade engineering, delivering long-term reliability whilst remaining manageable for installation and repositioning when required.

Volume

With a unit volume of 0.12m³, the Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens are compact yet powerful. The intelligent internal layout maximises usable cooking space while maintaining a minimal external footprint. This balance is critical for operators seeking high output within restricted spatial parameters.

Cooking Compartment Dimensions

The internal cooking compartment measures 306mm in width, 322mm in depth and 176mm in height. These carefully engineered chamber dimensions allow for the preparation of a wide variety of menu items, including toasted sandwiches, pastries, pizzas, flatbreads, plated meals and reheated dishes.

The optimised cavity size promotes efficient air circulation and even heat distribution, ensuring consistent cooking results. Operators benefit from predictable performance, reduced waste and improved product presentation.

Performance and Commercial Application – Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens

The Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens are built to meet the demands of modern foodservice operations. Their compact format makes them particularly suitable for:

  • Grab-and-go retail environments

  • Coffee shops expanding into hot food

  • Hotel lounges and room service stations

  • Service stations and convenience stores

  • Education and workplace catering

By delivering high speed cooking in a small footprint, the Oracle XS allows businesses to diversify menus, increase average spend and reduce reliance on labour-intensive cooking processes.

Why Choose Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens?

In today’s competitive hospitality sector, efficiency, speed and consistency are non-negotiable. The Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens offer a professional solution that bridges the gap between compact design and high-performance cooking technology.

Operators benefit from:

  • Faster service times

  • Improved workflow efficiency

  • Reduced kitchen congestion

  • Enhanced menu flexibility

  • Strong return on investment

Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens – Compact Innovation for Professional Kitchens

The Lainox Oracle XS High Speed Ovens are not simply compact ovens; they are revenue-generating assets designed for forward-thinking operators. Built with precision engineering and optimised for commercial environments, they empower businesses to serve hot, high-quality food quickly and consistently.

title: CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven

features.description:
CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven: Professional Performance in a Compact Footprint

The CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven is a powerful and space-efficient solution for professional kitchens that demand reliability, consistency and precision baking. Designed for countertop installation, this commercial electric convection oven is ideal for cafés, bakeries, restaurants, staff canteens and hospitality venues seeking dependable performance in a compact format.

Engineered with robust materials and efficient airflow technology, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven delivers uniform heat distribution, reduced cooking times and consistently high-quality results across a wide range of menu items.

Key Features and Benefits – CombiSteel 7543.0005 

  • Compact tabletop design ideal for space-conscious kitchens

  • Stainless steel 430 construction for durability and hygiene

  • Wide temperature range from +50°C to +250°C

  • Supplied with 3 x 1/2 aluminium plated baking trays

  • Powerful 2.1kW electric output

  • Standard 230V connection for simple installation

  • Even heat distribution for consistent baking results

Technical Specifications – CombiSteel 7543.0005 Convection Oven

Dimensions – Unit

With a width of 415mm, depth of 600mm and height of 502mm, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven is designed to maximise production capacity whilst maintaining a compact footprint. Its tabletop configuration allows operators to optimise valuable kitchen space without compromising performance. The balanced proportions make it suitable for countertop positioning in both back-of-house and front-of-house environments.

Material – Stainless Steel 430

Constructed from high-quality 430 stainless steel, this convection oven offers excellent resistance to corrosion and daily wear. The smooth stainless steel finish supports hygiene compliance, is easy to clean and maintains a professional appearance even in demanding commercial settings. Its durable construction ensures long-term reliability and reduced maintenance costs.

Accessories Included – 3 x 1/2 Aluminium Plated Baking Trays

Supplied with three 1/2 size aluminium plated baking trays, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven is ready for immediate operation. These trays promote efficient heat transfer and even baking, enabling operators to produce pastries, baked goods, savoury dishes and reheated items with consistent results. The included accessories enhance productivity and eliminate the need for additional initial investment.

Net Weight – 18kg

With a net weight of 18kg, this convection oven is sturdy enough to provide stable operation whilst remaining manageable for installation and repositioning. The balanced design supports secure countertop placement without unnecessary strain on work surfaces.

Gross Weight – 21kg

At 21kg gross weight, the unit demonstrates its solid build quality and reinforced internal components. This reflects its suitability for daily commercial use where durability and performance consistency are essential.

Voltage – 230V

Operating at 230 volts, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven connects easily to standard UK commercial electrical supplies. This simplifies installation and allows businesses to integrate the oven into existing kitchen infrastructure without complex electrical modifications.

Frequency – 50Hz

Designed to operate at 50Hz, the oven aligns with UK electrical standards, ensuring stable and efficient performance during continuous use. This compatibility supports long-term operational reliability.

Electrical Power – 2.1kW

With a 2.1kW power rating, this electric convection oven provides efficient heating capacity for rapid preheating and consistent temperature maintenance. The powerful output ensures reduced recovery times between batches, supporting higher productivity during peak service periods.

Version – Electric

As a fully electric model, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven delivers clean, controllable and energy-efficient cooking. Electric operation allows precise temperature management, improved safety and simplified maintenance compared to gas alternatives.

Model Type – Tabletop

The tabletop design makes this convection oven highly versatile. Ideal for kitchens with limited floor space, it can be installed on counters, preparation stations or integrated into modular kitchen layouts. This flexibility makes it particularly attractive for independent operators and growing hospitality businesses.

Temperature Range – +50°C to +250°C

Offering a temperature range from +50°C to +250°C, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven supports a broad spectrum of cooking applications. From low-temperature holding and gentle baking to high-temperature roasting and finishing, this range provides full menu flexibility. Accurate temperature control ensures consistent product quality and improved food presentation.

Advanced Features – CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven

Even Heat Distribution

The convection system circulates hot air evenly throughout the chamber, eliminating hot spots and ensuring uniform cooking results. This promotes consistent browning, reliable texture and improved batch control, reducing food waste and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Rapid Heat Recovery

Thanks to its efficient electric heating element and optimised airflow design, the oven maintains stable internal temperatures even during frequent door openings. This rapid recovery performance is essential in fast-paced commercial kitchens.

Compact Commercial Versatility

Despite its compact size, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven delivers professional output suitable for:

  • Artisan baking

  • Pastries and cakes

  • Savoury pies and quiches

  • Roasted vegetables

  • Reheating prepared meals

  • Light roasting applications

Elevate Your Kitchen Performance with the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven

The CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven is more than just a compact oven; it is a practical investment in efficiency, consistency and professional-grade performance. Built for modern catering environments, it combines durable stainless steel construction, powerful electric heating and space-saving design to deliver exceptional results day after day.

The CombiSteel 7543.0005 Oven – Your Reliable Baking Solution

If you are seeking a dependable, energy-efficient and commercially robust convection oven that integrates seamlessly into your kitchen, the CombiSteel 7543.0005 Electric Convection Oven is the ideal choice. Designed for performance, built for durability and optimised for productivity, it provides the precision and reliability required to meet the demands of today’s professional foodservice industry.

features.description:
These stainless steel tables with void from Parry have 1.2mm thick stainless steel with no undershelf, all the bases and legs are made from Type 430 Stainless steel. All Parry tables come fully welded to ensure maximum strength and durability.

This is a special order item and manufactured to individual specifications. If you require unique dimensions, please contact the team for more information about Parry made to measure items and bespoke stainless steel tables.

title: Parry SINK1060LFP Stainless Steel Sink

features.description:
Why Buy the Parry SINK1060LFP Stainless Steel Sink?

A stainless steel commercial sink is a core feature of any professional kitchen. Whether used specifically for washing ingredients or as part of the potwash section to rinse off plates and cooking utensils, choosing a strong, durable model is vital to withstand the stresses of a commercial environment. Parry stainless steel commercial sinks are manufactured using high quality 304 grade stainless steel to guarantee that every sink is capable of tolerating tough working conditions. Many Parry commercial stainless steel sinks are available as either flat packed or fully welded models to cater to the differing requirements of every business. 

Parry SINK1060LFP Stainless Steel Self Assembly Sinks. This stainless steel self-assembly sink from Parry has 400 x 400 x 250 bowl size and 1mm thick tops, has adjustable feet and valance included as standard. 1mm thick tops. High quality 304 stainless steel tops. Complete with 1 undershelf. Adjustable feet. Valance included as standard. Sliding doors available as an option POA. The Parry stainless steel sinks commercial with right hand bowl and left hand drainer are not supplied with taps as standard.

Key Features of the Parry SINK1060LFP Sink:

  • Stainless steel construction
  • Adjustable feet & valance included as standard
  • High-quality 304-grade stainless steel
  • Full 24-month warranty included as standard

Parry Warranty Information:

This unit comes with a full 24-month warranty.

title: Parry MWBTC Mobile Cold Water Hand Basin

features.description:
Parry MWBTC Mobile Cold Water Hand Basin: Optimal Hygiene On-the-Go

The Parry MWBTC Mobile Cold Water Hand Basin is a groundbreaking solution for commercial catering environments demanding flexibility and stringent hygiene standards. Its design is geared towards facilitating cleanliness in spaces where traditional setups are unfeasible.

Essential Features of the Parry MWBTC Hand Basin

Designed for Mobility and Convenience:

  • Portable Design: Outfitted with rear wheels, this basin is highly mobile, making it perfect for outdoor events, food trucks, or any setting without fixed water installations.
  • User-Friendly: Its ergonomic design ensures ease of use in fast-paced environments.

High Capacity and Compliance with Health Standards:

  • Ample Water Capacity: The 15 litres capacity is ample for high-frequency use, reducing refill frequency and maintaining continuous operation.
  • Health and Safety Compliant: The removable waste water receptacle complies with HSE manual handling guidelines, ensuring a safe and hygienic disposal process.

Robust and Practical Construction:

  • Quality Material: Manufactured from premium stainless steel, it withstands the rigours of commercial use.
  • Foot Operated Pump: This feature allows for hygienic, hands-free operation, crucial in food handling areas.

Advanced Benefits of the Parry MWBTC Hand Basin

User-Centric Hygiene Solution:

The Parry MWBTC is not just a basin; it's a comprehensive hygiene solution designed with the end-user in mind. Its foot-operated pump minimises contact and reduces cross-contamination risks.

Versatile and Environmentally Friendly:

Ideal for various catering scenarios, this basin is an environmentally responsible choice, promoting water conservation and hygiene without the need for electrical power.

Aesthetic and Durable:

The sleek stainless steel finish is not only visually appealing but also ensures durability, seamlessly integrating into any catering setup while withstanding the demands of daily use.

Transform Your Catering Hygiene with Parry MWBTC

The Parry MWBTC Mobile Cold Water Hand Basin is more than just an addition to your equipment; it's a strategic investment in maintaining the highest hygiene standards. Its design and functionality make it an indispensable tool for any mobile or outdoor catering scenario.

In the fast-paced world of commercial catering and food preparation, maintaining stringent hygiene standards is paramount. The Parry MWBTCA Mobile Cold Water Hand Basin is ingeniously designed to meet and exceed these demands, offering a blend of mobility, efficiency, and uncompromising quality.

Mobile and Versatile:

title: Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin

features.description:
•  

  • Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin: Enhance Hygiene Anywhere, Effortlessly

     

    Experience the ultimate blend of convenience, quality, and compliance with the Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin. Engineered to meet the rigorous demands of commercial kitchens, outdoor catering events, and healthcare environments, this robust unit is your solution for maintaining high standards of hygiene and operation efficiency. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, the Parry MWBT ensures durability and reliability wherever it's needed.

    Key Features and Benefits of the Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin

    Capacity and Construction:

    • 15 Litres Capacity: Ample size to handle high-demand scenarios, reducing the frequency of refills.
    • Manufactured from High Quality Stainless Steel: Guarantees a long-lasting, rust-resistant and easy-to-clean surface.

    Power and Efficiency:

    • 3kW Power Supplied with a 13amp Plug: Offers quick heat-up times and efficient power usage, ensuring that water temperature is consistently maintained at 42 degrees Celsius.
    • Foot Operated Water Pump: Promotes hygiene with hands-free operation, minimising the risk of cross-contamination.

    Safety and Compliance:

    • Pressure Cut-out Feature: Prevents the hot water tank from boiling dry, ensuring safety and energy efficiency.
    • Removable Waste Water Receptacle: Aligns with HSE manual handling guidelines, making it safe and easy to dispose of water without heavy lifting.

    Mobility and Convenience:

    • Rear Wheels for Easy Manoeuvring: Enhances portability and allows for effortless positioning anywhere it's required.
    • Dimensions (W x D x H): Measuring at a compact 450 x 600 x 900 mm, it fits well in any space without obstructing pathways.

    Advanced Features of the Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin

    Optimal Water Temperature:

    • Water Temperature Maintained at 42 Degrees: Ideal for killing bacteria while being safe to touch, ensuring optimal hand washing conditions.

    Designed for Ease and Efficiency:

    • Foot Operated Water Pump: Allows for a hygienic and user-friendly operation, ideal in busy settings where hands may be full or soiled.

    Robust and Easy to Maintain:

    • High-Quality Stainless Steel Construction: Offers unmatched durability and ease of cleaning, standing up to the wear and tear of commercial use.

    Portable and Practical:

    • Rear Wheels Design: Provides smooth mobility across various floor types, enabling quick and easy relocation to meet changing needs throughout the day.

    Elevate Your Hygiene Standards with the Parry MWBT

    The Parry MWBT Mobile Heated Hand Basin is not just a practical investment; it's a cornerstone for health and safety in any high-traffic environment. Each feature is thoughtfully designed to address the complex needs of modern commercial settings, ensuring that your operations remain hygienic, compliant, and efficient. The elegant stainless steel finish complements any professional environment, offering both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

    The Parry MWBT Heated Hand Basin - Your Partner in Professional Hygiene

    Step into a world where maintaining cleanliness is convenient and effective. With the Parry MWBT, you're not just choosing a mobile sink; you're choosing a commitment to superior hygiene and operational excellence. Equip your space with the Parry MWBT and ensure that your hygiene practices are second to none. Welcome to a new standard of cleanliness and efficiency.

description:
Parry CON1000 Condensate Canopies - 1000mm Width: Enhancing Kitchen Environment

Introducing the Parry CON1000 Condensate Canopies, a pivotal addition to any commercial kitchen. With a width of 1000mm, this condensate canopy is expertly designed to manage kitchen air quality, significantly reducing steam and grease build-up. Ideal for busy culinary environments, the Parry CON1000 ensures a cleaner, safer, and more comfortable workspace.

Key Features and Benefits - Parry CON1000 Condensate Canopies

Optimal Air Quality Management:

  • Efficient Steam Control: Effectively captures and eliminates steam, maintaining a clear and comfortable kitchen environment.
  • Grease Reduction: Minimises airborne grease, contributing to a cleaner cooking area and reducing fire risks.

Robust and Durable Design:

  • Constructed from High-Quality Stainless Steel: Ensures longevity and resistance to the harsh conditions of a commercial kitchen.
  • Heavy-Duty Build: Capable of withstanding the rigours of constant use, providing a reliable long-term solution.

User-Friendly and Practical:

  • Easy Installation: Designed for a straightforward setup, making it a practical choice for various kitchen layouts.
  • Compact 1000mm Width: Ideal for kitchens with limited space, offering effective air management without occupying too much room.

Enhanced Safety and Comfort:

  • Improved Kitchen Environment: By controlling condensation and grease, it enhances the safety and comfort of kitchen staff.
  • Supports Hygiene Standards: Helps maintain a cleaner cooking area, aligning with hygiene and health regulations.

The Parry CON1000 - Essential for Modern Kitchens

The Parry CON1000 Condensate Canopies are not just another accessory; they are a critical component in creating an optimal kitchen environment. Perfect for high-demand kitchens, they play a key role in maintaining air quality, hygiene, and safety.

Elevate Your Kitchen's Performance with Parry CON1000

Investing in the Parry CON1000 Condensate Canopies means a commitment to a high-quality, efficient, and safe cooking environment. Their integration into your kitchen will enhance operational efficiency and provide a significant boost to the overall working conditions.

title: Parry USINK600 Stainless Steel Pot Wash Sink

features.description:
Parry USINK600 Stainless Steel Pot Wash Sink: The Cornerstone of Every Commercial Kitchen

Step into a world of unmatched durability and sophistication with the Parry USINK600 Stainless Steel Pot Wash Sink. Designed with the demands of commercial kitchens in mind, this sink combines practical features with sleek design, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

Key Features and Benefits - Parry USINK600 Stainless Steel Pot Wash Sink

Product Description:

  • Material: Crafted from high-grade stainless steel
  • Optional Splash Back: Enhances cleanliness and hygiene, please call for a quote.
  • Flexible Tap Mounting: Accommodates both wall-mounted and top-mounted taps (taps not included)

The Parry USINK600 is not just a sink; it's a vital component of your kitchen’s hygiene and efficiency. Made from robust stainless steel, it promises longevity and resistance to the daily wear and tear of commercial use. The optional splash back keeps your walls clean from water splashes, and the flexibility in tap installation allows for a customised setup based on your specific needs.

Dimensions:

  • Overall Size: 600(W) x 700(D) x 1265(H) mm

This spacious design ensures ample room for handling large pots and pans, making it an essential tool for fast-paced kitchens. Despite its generous size, the design remains compact enough to fit into various kitchen layouts without compromising on space.

Advanced Features of the Parry USINK600

Hygiene and Maintenance:

  • Stainless Steel Construction: Ensures easy cleaning and superb durability.
  • Splash Back Option: Protects walls from water damage and stains.

Installation and Adaptability:

  • No Taps Included: Offers the freedom to choose taps that best fit your kitchen’s style and functional needs.
  • Adjustable Feet: Allows perfect levelling on uneven kitchen floors, enhancing stability and safety.

Elevate Your Kitchen’s Functionality with the Parry USINK600

Choosing the Parry USINK600 Stainless Steel Pot Wash Sink means investing in the efficiency of your kitchen operations. Its robust construction and thoughtful features address the core needs of busy commercial environments, ensuring that your kitchen remains a bastion of cleanliness and productivity.

The Parry USINK600: A Synthesis of Style and Substance

Embrace the blend of superior craftsmanship and ergonomic design with the Parry USINK600. It’s not merely a piece of equipment but a pivotal enhancement to your culinary workspace, facilitating better hygiene practices and smoother operations. With its sleek stainless steel finish, it integrates seamlessly into any kitchen decor, symbolising a perfect fusion of form and function.

title: Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB Bakerlux Shop Master

features.description:
Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB Bakerlux Shop Master: The Ultimate Baking Solution

Discover the epitome of baking innovation with the Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB Bakerlux Shop Master. This high-end convection oven is engineered for culinary professionals who demand perfection and efficiency in their baking processes. Ideal for a wide range of baked goods, especially pastries and frozen bakery items, it's a game-changer in commercial kitchens, bakeries, and cafes.

Outstanding Features and Benefits of the Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB

Advanced Baking Capabilities

  • Convection Oven with Humidity Control: Masterfully bake a variety of items with precise humidity settings, ensuring perfect texture and taste every time.
  • Two Programmable Fan Speeds: Tailor your baking process with dual fan speeds, allowing you to adjust for different baking requirements.
  • 304 Stainless Steel Cooking Chamber: Crafted for durability and hygiene, the AISI 304 stainless steel chamber also simplifies cleaning and maintenance.

User-Friendly and Efficient

  • 7" Touch Digital Panel: Effortlessly manage baking with a user-friendly interface, storing cooking programs along with their images and names for easy access.
  • CHEFUNOX Automatic Management: Achieve consistent, high-quality results even in the absence of qualified staff, thanks to the advanced automatic cooking process management.

Connectivity and Data Management

  • Internet-Ready: Connect to the datadrivencooking.com portal for innovative cooking solutions and data analytics, enhancing kitchen efficiency.
  • Wi-Fi/USB Data Capability: Streamline kitchen management with easy downloading and uploading of HACCP data and programs.

Key Features at a Glance

  • Rounded Edge Cooking Chamber for Easy Cleaning
  • Double Glass Door for Optimal Insulation
  • LED Lights in the Door for Enhanced Visibility
  • Chrome-Plated Steel Rack Rails with Anti-Tip System
  • High-Performance Circular Heating Elements

Why Choose the Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB?

Tailored Baking Experience

Enjoy unparalleled flexibility and control in your baking with customisable settings and programmable features, ensuring every item is baked to perfection.

Hygienic and Easy Maintenance

The oven's design not only emphasises baking efficiency but also focuses on ease of cleaning and maintenance, maintaining high hygiene standards in your kitchen.

Smart Kitchen Compatibility

Stay ahead in the culinary world with smart connectivity options, allowing for efficient kitchen management and data-driven decision making.

Elevate Your Baking Artistry with Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB

The Unox XEFR-04HS-EMRV-GB Bakerlux Shop Master is not just an oven; it's a complete baking solution. With its advanced features, robust construction, and user-friendly design, it stands as an indispensable asset in any commercial kitchen aiming for baking excellence.

title: Panasonic NE1880 Gastronorm Microwave

features.description:
Why Buy the Panasonic NE1880 Commercial Microwave?

The Panasonic NE1880 Gastronorm Microwave is the ideal choice for multiportion production in busy commercial kitchens. With space to hold two 1/1 GN containers, that's the equivalent of 4 plates or 12 large soup bowls, even the highest of demands can be met. Offering 4 power levels, 16 presets and the ability to operate 2 and 3 stage cooking processes, a full range of dishes can be prepared to professional standards.

With quad emission, fast heating, even temperature distribution and consistent results are guaranteed as standard. Cleaning is also made easy thanks to quality stainless steel construction, internal rounded corners, a removable shelf and a removable ceramic plate. 

Key Features of the NE1880 Microwave Oven

  • 1800W power output
  • 4 power levels; high, medium, low and defrost
  • 16 presets available
  • Quick start function
  • 2 cooking levels with removable shelf
  • 2 and 3 stage cooking
  • Digital display
  • Quad emission
  • High performance stainless steel construction
  • Pull down drop door gives easy clear access
  • Program lock for one touch operation
  • Cycle counter records number of operations
  • Removable ceramic plate
  • Rounded internal corners deliver easy cleaning

Panasonic also offers a high power model for faster cooking results to the same professional standard.
features.short_description:
• 1.8kW power output
  • Programmable touch controls
  • Accepts 1/1 GN containers
  • 44 litre capacity

title: Panasonic NE3280 Gastronorm Microwave

features.description:
Why Buy the Panasonic NE3280?

The NE3280 Commercial Microwave from Panasonic is a powerhouse when it comes to commercial catering applications.

With a large 44 Litre capacity which fits 1/1 GN as well as a removable shelf and an adjustable heating output of up to 3200W, this machine is hard to beat when it comes to large volume cooking. 
The quick start with quad-emission magnetrons mean that this oven has the power to 'steam' food from the inside by generating steam from the water contained within the food itself - in half the time of a conventional steamer. 4 magnetrons and rotating wave guides provide fast and even heating.
Easy to install, clean and maintain, the NE3280 has programmable touch controls with a 3 stage, 16 program memory, as well as manual controls.

Key Features of the Panasonic NE3280 Gastronorm Microwave:

  • Removable shelf
  • 4 power levels up to 3200W power output
  • Programmable touch controls
  • 3 stage, 16 program memory
  • Full 3-year warranty

Panasonic Warranty Information:

This unit comes with a full 3-year warranty.

title: Parry Air-In Titan Canopy

features.description:
Why buy the Parry Air-In Titan Canopy?

The Parry Air-In Titan Canopy has separate speed controllers to the exhaust fans and the inlet fans meaning that you can change the speed that the fan is working at on both of the fans so that if you want more or less air being taken then you can. The exhaust air goes into the rear or top of the unit and the inlet air goes to the side as standard. 

This unit is manufactured with a full length air in plenum into which replacement air is drawn by a supply fan and from which air flows into the kitchen via a diffuser in the front of the canopy.

The unit itself is made from high quality stainless steel meaning that it has a heavy duty construction, so it will be long lasting. This also means that it is easy to clean because of the stainless steel exterior, also it comes with a grease collection draw so all the grease that ends up on the canopy will drip down into the draw, and you can get rid of it easily.

Specification of the Parry Air-In Titan Canopy:

  • Manufactured from high quality stainless steel
  • Heavy duty construction
  • Easy clean design
  • Grease collection draw
  • Exhaust air to rear or top as standard
  • Inlet air to side as standard
  • Separate speed controllers to exhaust fans and
    inlet fans

Please Note: canopies must overhang gas appliances by a minimum of 250mm on all sides unless fitted adjacent to a wall.

title: Lainox Oracle High Speed Ovens

features.description:
Introducing the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven

Step into the future of commercial cooking with the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven. This powerhouse combines state-of-the-art technology with robust design to deliver exceptional culinary results. Built to meet the demands of any high-volume kitchen, the Lainox Oracle is your all-in-one solution for fast, efficient, and versatile cooking.

Key Features and Benefits - Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven

Technical Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 630(H) x 467(W) x 609(D)mm
  • Cooking Area: 426 x 510mm
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Voltage: 230V or 400V
  • Power Supply: Option of 13a plug
  • Weight: 63kg
  • Colour: Silver
  • Plug and Play: No water connection required, easy installation anywhere

Key Features:

  • Dual Cooking Modes: Operates in high speed oven mode or combi wave mode, utilising either convection, microwave, or both.
  • Versatility: Replaces multiple appliances, enhancing kitchen efficiency.
  • User Interface: 7" user-friendly touch screen display for custom menu configurations.
  • Oracle Odourless System: Minimises steam and odours, eliminating the need for traditional extraction systems.
  • Space-Efficient: Compact design maximises kitchen space without sacrificing performance.

Advanced Capabilities of the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven

Unmatched Cooking Flexibility

The Lainox Oracle allows you to seamlessly switch between high speed and combi wave cooking modes, giving you the flexibility to adapt to any cooking situation without the need for multiple separate appliances. Whether you’re rapidly cooking a batch of pastries or delicately roasting meat, this oven adjusts to your needs.

Effortless Operation and Maintenance

Designed with a plug and play setup and requiring no water connection, the Lainox Oracle can be installed in any commercial kitchen layout. Its user-friendly 7-inch touch screen display not only simplifies operation but also enables customisation of menus, making it an invaluable tool for kitchens with a diverse menu.

Odour and Steam Reduction

Thanks to the innovative Oracle Odourless system, this high speed oven reduces the amount of steam and odours produced during cooking. This pivotal feature allows for the oven to be placed in various locations within the kitchen, without the constraints imposed by conventional extraction systems.

Transform Your Cooking Experience with the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven

Embrace the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven and elevate your kitchen’s operational efficiency. Its cutting-edge technology ensures rapid cooking times, while its versatile features allow for a wide range of culinary applications, from quick-service restaurants to high-end catering.

The Lainox Oracle: Your Partner in Culinary Excellence

The Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven isn’t just an appliance; it’s a transformational tool designed to streamline your cooking process, enhance flavour profiles, and reduce kitchen workload. By integrating such advanced technology, this oven is set to become the cornerstone of modern commercial kitchens, helping chefs achieve consistent, high-quality results every time.

Opt for the Lainox Oracle High Speed Oven today and redefine the efficiency and quality of your culinary outputs. With its sleek design, versatile functionality, and powerful performance, it's tailored to propel your kitchen into the future of commercial cooking.
